entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain along the coast early this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
